skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...
skill.author: Azeem-2

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only brand guidelines text. All 38 static findings are false positives triggered by hex color codes in markdown (mistaken for crypto patterns), Apache license URLs, and markdown backtick syntax. No executable code, file operations, or network capabilities exist.

content.user_title: Apply Anthropic Brand Colors and Typography
content.value_statement: Applying consistent brand styling requires knowing the exact colors and fonts. This skill provides Anthropic's official brand guidelines so you can quickly style any artifact.
actual_capabilities: Provides Anthropic brand color palette with hex values
Specifies Poppins font for headings with Arial fallback
Specifies Lora font for body text with Georgia fallback
Documents accent color rotation for shapes
Guides smart color selection based on background
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files directly
Cannot install fonts on your system
Only provides guidelines, not automated styling
Requires manual application of colors and fonts

use_cases.title: Style Presentations On-Brand
use_cases.description: Apply Anthropic brand colors and fonts to PowerPoint slides for consistent visual identity across presentations.

use_cases.title: Ensure Brand Compliance
use_cases.description: Reference official Anthropic brand guidelines to verify marketing materials use correct colors and typography.

use_cases.title: Build Branded UI Components
use_cases.description: Use exact hex values and font specifications to create user interfaces matching Anthropic visual standards.

prompt_templates.title: Get Brand Colors
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the official Anthropic brand colors? Include the hex values for dark, light, and accent colors.

prompt_templates.title: Style a Presentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me style my presentation using Anthropic brand guidelines. Apply Poppins to headings and Lora to body text.

prompt_templates.title: Check Color Compliance
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my design against Anthropic brand guidelines. Check if the colors match the official palette.

prompt_templates.title: Apply Full Brand System
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the complete Anthropic brand system to my document. Use dark backgrounds with light text and cycle through accent colors for shapes.

output_examples.input: What are the Anthropic brand colors?
output: Main colors: Dark #141413, Light #faf9f5, Mid Gray #b0aea5, Light Gray #e8e6dc
Use dark for primary text, light for backgrounds, accents for decorative elements
Headings: Poppins font (24pt and larger), with Arial as fallback
Body text: Lora font, with Georgia as fallback
Note: Install Poppins and Lora fonts for best results

best_practices: Pre-install Poppins and Lora fonts in your environment for best visual results
Use accent color rotation for visual variety while staying on-brand
Apply correct text colors based on background: light text on dark, dark text on light
anti_patterns: Do not use non-brand colors for primary text or backgrounds
Do not mix heading and body fonts inconsistently across documents
Do not apply accent colors to text as they are intended for shapes only

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides brand guidelines that any compatible AI assistant can reference.

faq.question: What fonts does this skill specify?
faq.answer: Poppins for headings and Lora for body text. Arial and Georgia serve as fallbacks when primary fonts are unavailable.

faq.question: Does this skill install fonts automatically?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides font specifications only. You must install Poppins and Lora fonts separately for best results.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill contains only documentation text. It does not access files, network, or execute any code.

faq.question: What are the main brand colors?
faq.answer: Dark #141413, Light #faf9f5, Mid Gray #b0aea5, and Light Gray #e8e6dc. Accents are Orange #d97757, Blue #6a9bcc, Green #788c5d.

faq.question: How do I use the accent colors correctly?
faq.answer: Apply accent colors to shapes and decorative elements, not text. Cycle through orange, blue, and green to maintain visual interest.
